description: The Spire GTX is perfect for hikers who want a light duty hiking boot for day trips in variable to rugged terrain, and for backpackers who seek a versatile and waterproof boot that breathes well and supports lighter loads.
name: La Sportiva Spire GTX - Mens

specs.value: Ortholite Hybrid with 5% recycled rubber + 15% production waste foam
Vibram® XS Trek with Impact Brake System™
